descriptions.description: TinyFugue, aka "tf", is a flexible, screen-oriented MUD client, for use with any type of text MUD.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=tf PACKAGE_VERSION=5.0b8
oegextract tf-50b8.tar.gz
oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegimport pcre oegimport ncurses oegimport zlib oegimport openssl
rm -rf autom4te.cache rm -rf macos rm -rf os2 rm -rf os2make.cmd rm -rf src/pcre-2.08
# Activate the use of an external (current) pcre-lib, the internal pcre library # is very old and has compile problems and it is senseless to fix this old code. oegpatch 001
oegpatch 002 # configure should not exit from execution when netdb.h or select() is missing.
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --enable-getaddrinfo --disable-mailcheck --enable-termcap=ncurses
rm bogus.mak
oegpatch 003 # remove PLATFORM_OS2 code oegpatch 004 # configure a new DATADIR definition. oegpatch 005 # tfio.h - remove warnings (double defines) oegpatch 006 # replace wprintf() with tfwprintf() oegpatch 007 # remove unused caddr_t oegpatch 008 # comment out not existing includes (netdb, socket) oegpatch 009 # remove the feature to disable core dumps oegpatch 010 # remove core command and core()/error_exit(), uses now crash() oegpatch 011 # remove the ability to create core dumps oegpatch 012 # SIGQUIT missed in signals.c oegpatch 013 # forgot to remove a call in 011 oegpatch 014 # forgot to remove init_exename call/declaration
